workExperience.title: Skyscanner Front-End Software Engineering virtual experience programme on Forage
workExperience.description: In this activity, I performed a job simulation assuming the role of a front-end engineer at Skyscanner, where I built a web application using React. During the process, I developed a specific page to allow users to choose a travel date. To do this, I used the open source Backpack React library, created by Skyscanner, which makes it easy to develop coherent and attractive user interfaces. In addition to implementing this functionality, I customized the application according to the established requirements and ran automated tests to ensure that everything was processed correctly and met quality standards.
